data.system_settings: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (stock GNOME desktop env), 64-bit processor Ryzen 7 2700X
data.expected_result: Channels should be sorted according to their position in server list
data.short_description: In the dropdown menu to select welcome message channel in server settings, channels are sorted incorrectly
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Server Settings > Overview  - Expand the dropdown menu to select the welcome message channel - Observe channel list in the dropdown
